mapper.sql: id, title, business_code, create_user, sql_status, business_type, sql_type, create_date, update_date, output_data, input_data, sql_templates,support_to_do,udf_to_do,timet,version_num,backup_type
mapper.select:
select
from visua_sql_example_ver where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by version_num DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into visua_sql_example_ver (id, title, business_code, create_user, sql_status, business_type, sql_type, create_date, update_date, output_data, input_data, sql_templates,support_to_do,udf_to_do,timet,version_num,backup_type ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqlStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sqlType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{outputData,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{inputData,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{sqlTemplates,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{supportToDo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{udfToDo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{timet,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{versionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{backupType,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
